full_text: Former inmate's property From [Redacted] To [Redacted] Date 2019/11/01 14:43 Subject: Former inmate's property Attachments: TEXT.htm Hey guys, I received a phone call from a [Redacted] who claims to be Jeffrey Epstein's brother. He was asking the status of Mr. Epstein's property and if or when it would be released to him. I explained to him that normally we mail it to the last know address on record. He left his number just in case anyone wanted to reach out. [Redacted] Case Manager Coordinator Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 Tel: (646)836-6300 Fax: (646)836-7683 [Redacted] @bop.gov Page 5594 DOJ-OGR-00024403

text_blocks.content: Former inmate's property From [Redacted] To [Redacted] Date 2019/11/01 14:43 Subject: Former inmate's property Attachments: TEXT.htm

Hey guys, I received a phone call from a [Redacted] who claims to be Jeffrey Epstein's brother. He was asking the status of Mr. Epstein's property and if or when it would be released to him. I explained to him that normally we mail it to the last know address on record. He left his number just in case anyone wanted to reach out.
[Redacted] Case Manager Coordinator Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 Tel: (646)836-6300 Fax: (646)836-7683 [Redacted] @bop.gov

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
